items.sentence: Where did Tom learn how to play the guitar like that?
The interior of Tom\'s house is decorated tastefully.
Tom knew that Mary said she wasn\'t going to do that.
Tom knew that he couldn\'t do what needed to be done.
Tom knew that he wasn\'t going to be able to do that.
Tell Tom that I already know how to get to his place.
Tell Tom what you think about the article Mary wrote.
Are you having second thoughts about getting married?
Do you think it would be possible for Tom to do that?
Tom is better at speaking French than the rest of us.
Tom didn\'t know who to invite to his birthday party.
Tom didn\'t want to kiss Mary, but she wanted him to.
I doubt that Tom will tell Mary what really happened.
Tom used to bring me here to swim when I was younger.
Tom walked over to the sink and turned on the faucet.
Neither Tom nor Mary is very good at speaking French.
Tom is always threatening to quit, but he never does.
Tom is going to ask Mary if she can help us tomorrow.
I\'m fairly certain that Tom will pass today\'s exam.
Have you ever pretended to be sick when you weren\'t?
